summary: Realistic player tree house in the marshes. Has every thing you need storage* bed* enchanter* anvil* tanning rack* follower compatible* smelter* alchemy lab* cooking pot* weapon plaques* mannequin as well as not being in a separate cell so you can defend your home from creatures etc...
descriptionHtml:
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>Info<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<

[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/53wb3a.jpg[/IMG]

I am starting a realistic player home series for those immersion buffs. 

You have come across the home of a once compulsive hoarder who built his home up on top of and around a giant tree stump. It has all the storage you need as well as plaques to show off your weapons and 1 mannequin as they are a rare find in skyrim aswell as not being in a separate cell so you can defend your home from creatures etc

----------------------SaioTV Features Hoarders Home in his Skyrim Mod Series!---------------------------
[youtube]C6Yu_iSMmw0[/youtube]



------------------Installation------------------
drop the esp file into your skyrim data folder

Requires - Skyrim.esm
             - Update.esm (latest)


----------Lore Friendly Player Home Series----------
author: RatFinkk
